p: Egypt is situated on important migratory flyways for wild birds between different continents [ 51]. Birds intended for sale in LBMs for human consumption were sampled and a novel reassortant strain of H6N2 was identified and isolated from a Eurasian Teal. This novel virus possesses a reassortant pattern originating from differing AIV gene pools. The complete genome sequence was obtained and designated as (H6N2) A/Eurasian teal/Egypt/P2-29/2017 (EG/P2-29) [ 4].
